Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-12, affected by CVE-2026-0994
